    • ClientBLL

      public ClientBLL(ConnectionFactory connectionFactory, MainFrame mainFrame)
      Creates a new instance of ClientBLL.
      Parameters:
      connectionFactory - is the object holding the connection to the database.
      mainFrame - is the main window of the application, which will have to be updated in this class when client changes are made.

  • Method Details

    • validateClient

      public int validateClient(String id, String name, String address, String phone, String email, String dateOfBirth)
      Validates the input provided by the user when trying to edit/add a client. If the input is correct, it edits/inserts the new client and makes the necessary updates in the GUI and in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - provided a valid integer
      name - checked to be not empty and containing only letters and spaces.
      address - can be null and can contain any character.
      phone - can be null and if it is not null must have exactly 10 digits.
      email - checked to be not empty and have a valid email format.
      dateOfBirth - can be null, if not null then it must have the format 'yyyy-mm-dd'.
      Returns:
      -1 if the input is correct and the updates were made, 0 if the name is incorrect, 1 if the phone is incorrect, 2 if the email is incorrect and 3 if the date of birth is incorrect.

    • deleteClient

      public void deleteClient(int id)
      Deletes the client from the application and makes the updates in the GUI and database.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the client that will be deleted, provided it is a valid id.
